column12: It has been a while since I first listened to it, but I do remember that most of the properties of black holes discussed in it I already knew about. Regardless, I was still interested in listening to see if I could learn anything new.
column14: It made me more interested in the sense that I will likely now participate in more contests like these when I get informed about it. It also made me want to learn more about black holes, since I do know there's still much to be learned.

column20: I have no questions regarding black holes, other than what could be the most probable solution to the Information Paradox, nor do I have any advice since the competition was pretty straight forward.
